website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas D Howard 6 is a performer despite its size and ventilation issues. The non-scuffing outsole can stand wear and tear from either playing or casual use. The athlete can rely on the SprintFrame and Adiprene technologies to deliver support and responsiveness during gameplay.If you are one who love to play hoops outdoors, the Adidas D Howard 6 is a great pair to own. You will enjoy the comfort and support so much that you forget that you still have shoes on, especially after breaking it in. This shoe is just like the HOVR Havoc from Under Armour.
pros: The Adidas D Howard 6 has a traction system that is loved by many
Plenty of users recommend for new buyers to go true to size
A good number of wearers appreciate the good impact protection provided by the SprintFrame cushioning
A lot of wearers commend these all-black basketball sneakers for its thick and solid outsole, which is good for outdoor plays
Multiple users love to wear the shoe casually because of its unique design
Many acknowledge that the shoe model has a soft landing because of its good cushion
cons: The shoe runs too narrow say a few buyers
A number of wearers mention that the shoe needs time for breaking in
Some shoe owners leave comments on how the shoe easily falls apart
A handful claim the shoe is not breathable enough even with the surrounding perforations in the leather upper
It is as hot as the 12th basketball shoe from Air Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks of having these shoes a section of the sole had ripped and peeled up. I was able to super glue it back into place with no further problems. After a year both soles are peeling at the toecap and there is a horizonal full thickness tear in the leather around the midfoot on the left shoe. I only wore these shoes for a twenty game season in an Army basketball league. The durability of these shoes is questionable, but the comfort is good. They are soft on landing with good cushion. I would not recommend if you want a shoe for its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Gerez

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were for a gift. All in all they weren't very aesthetically pleasing to say the least but they are a very comfortable shoe from the receivers point of view. I'd buy these 100 times over at a $40 pricepoint on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Alas, Quality Control, we hardly knew ye...
customer_reviews.text: Like all too many brands of shoes these days, there's no telling if the size the shoe purports to be is anywhere near the size it actually is. You almost have to order two sizes too small, what you think you are, and two sizes larger just to see which one will actually fit.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisG

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The Men's D Howard 6 Basketball Shoe are a little big. But they are comfortable, look & feel great. The shoes are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: P. T.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. Says they are nice and cozy on his huge feet. I like them because he hasn't ripped them out yet; he's an extremely active student athlete.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Salas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ordered 1/2 size larger than normal, and it is still too small, am sending back
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Run small and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these per request for my boyfriend. He has worn size 13 Adidas since the beginning of time. Ordered these is a size 13 and they are WAY too small. Very narrow sole and very tight fit. Otherwise, very nice shoes. Good quality. Disappointed with size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Entirely too tight and narrow. I had two earlier Dwight Howard models, and was very happy with them. These shoes are way too tight and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Reardon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: Cushion/adiprene was comfortable.. but the fit was a bit small, my big toe kept hitting the front box while walking. I'm usually a size 8.5/9.. Felt like I could've gone 9.5 in these. I bought the white/grey colorway.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bit on the small side! After a few days of break in they loosened up. Overall a great shoe. If I was to reorder I would go a half size larger. Can't beat the price!.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Laing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. Got them for my kid and they look even nicer. He is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Shoe did feel comfortable and despite being a relatively high top
customer_reviews.text: A piece of the sole fell off after 8-10 uses on an indoor court. Shoe did feel comfortable and despite being a relatively high top, it was not heavy like some I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe.. But I don't think I'll reorder them maybe another color but I'll much rather move on to different Shoe.. And I thought the shoe would be more of a high top as it looks on the picture... But overall good shoe good size for me. 3/5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Howards shoes are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got them, plan on getting a couple more pair different colors. They are very comfortable and I love the way they look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real nice looking sneaks. Snatch them up quick. You won't find a nicer pair for 35 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Solley

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball
customer_reviews.text: Quality, speed of delivery, and price were all excellent..def wld but from seller again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Franklin-Thompson

customer_reviews.title: my 12yro son likes them
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is that they feel tigh, but he also has a wide feet. After an initial break-in I haven't heard any complaints,
customer_reviews.author: Rami3kds

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Met expectations, delivery was quick, I am happy with the purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elene C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but they run small so I am unable to wear them to work..
customer_reviews.author: T.H

customer_reviews.title: Im in love with my new shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Fits perfectly... was on time; and nicely packaged. Its
customer_reviews.author: Insta Jay

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit and killer shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are good quality and look sweet. i got my size at a killer price and love them. i see other reviews saying they run small but i got size 11 and they were exactly like a size 11 should fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, Sneakers feel comfortable and actually looks nicer in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had better fitting sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly good sneakers for the price. Nothing to write home about!
customer_reviews.author: RiChard Dumas

customer_reviews.title: The shoebox was in bad condition as it it had been sitting under other ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as expected. The box was a bit smashed and the shoes were somewhat compacted. The shoebox was in bad condition as it it had been sitting under other boxes for a while. I can't complain too much because the price was low for the shoe. Fairly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Clearview Concepts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I have issues with my feet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have issues with my feet. It's sometimes difficult for me to find sneakers that fit well. This particular Adidas sneaker is comfortable with great support.
customer_reviews.author: BDH

customer_reviews.title: Good to go...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneakers for the price. Good quality and construction. I wouldn't say my son has mad hops from them but they do they're job.
customer_reviews.author: DuffY

customer_reviews.title: I ordinarily wear a 10 1/2, I ordered 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordinarily wear a 10 1/2, I ordered 11 in case they ran a little tight, and I couldn't even get my foot in it
customer_reviews.author: BTango

product_meta.title: New Adidas D Howard 6 Basketball Shoe Black/scarlet 6
feature_bullets: D-Howard signature details on mid-rise men's basketball shoe^Full-length springy adiPRENE+ cushioning for a lightweight ride^Padded foam collar and cushioned ethylene vinyl acetate sock liner for comfort^Molded Adidas brand mark and 3-stripes on outsole for unique look^Non-marking adiwear rubber outsole for ultimate durability
